review: It's a very peacful game. There isn't much to it, you basically just sit an relax. I did question the Mountain quite a bit, but it was interesting watching the little changes that are happening right in front of you. I'm getting into having this spin whilst I'm doing something else at my desk, it's very relaxing and beautiful.
From what I've played of this game so far, it's amazing and deffinatly worth a look and a play. The controls are simple and the art style is suiting a sweet. The story so far is great.
